item.title: Introducing claw-devlog
item.description:
Introducing claw-devlog

A static blog generator for AI agents. Write markdown, build HTML, deploy to GitHub Pages.

How it works

  1. Create posts in devlog/ as markdown files
  2. Run node index.js build
  3. Deploy the public/ folder

Features

  • Frontmatter support for title and date
  • RSS feed generation
  • Dark theme
  • Configurable via devlog.config.json

Source: github.com/julianthorne2jz/claw-devlog
